00040 #include "egs_base_source.h"
00041 #include "egs_input.h"
00042 
00043 EGS_BaseSimpleSource::EGS_BaseSimpleSource(EGS_Input *input,
00044      EGS_ObjectFactory *f) : EGS_BaseSource(input,f), q(0), s(0), count(0) {
00045     int Q; int err = input->getInput("charge",Q);
00046     if( !err ) q = Q;
00047     s = EGS_BaseSpectrum::createSpectrum(input);
00048     if( !s ) egsWarning("EGS_BaseSimpleSource::EGS_BaseSimpleSource:\n"
00049             "    no spectrum was defined\n");
00050 }
00051 
00052 static EGS_LOCAL EGS_TypedObjectFactory<EGS_BaseSource>
00053 source_creator(string("egs++/dso/")+CONFIG_NAME,"EGS_BaseSource");
00054 
00055 EGS_BaseSource* EGS_BaseSource::createSource(EGS_Input *i) {
00056     //EGS_Object *o = source_creator.createSingleObject(i,"createSource",true);
00057     EGS_Object *o = source_creator.createObjects(i,"source definition",
00058             "source","simulation source","createSource",true);
00059     return dynamic_cast<EGS_BaseSource *>(o);
00060 }
00061 
00062 EGS_BaseSource* EGS_BaseSource::getSource(const string &Name) {
00063     EGS_Object *o = source_creator.getObject(Name);
00064     if( !o ) return 0;
00065     EGS_BaseSource *s = dynamic_cast<EGS_BaseSource *>(o);
00066     if( s ) return s;
00067     egsWarning("EGS_BaseSource::getSource(): dynamic cast failed?\n"
00068          "  Object named %s is of type %s. Trying simple cast\n",
00069          Name.c_str(),o->getObjectType().c_str());
00070     return (EGS_BaseSource *)o;
00071 }
00072 
00073 void EGS_BaseSource::addKnownSource(EGS_BaseSource *o) {
00074     if(o) egsInformation("Adding known source of type %s\n",
00075             o->getObjectType().c_str());
00076     source_creator.addKnownObject(o);
00077 }
00078 
00079 void EGS_BaseSource::addKnownTypeId(const char *tid) {
00080     source_creator.addKnownTypeId(tid);
00081 }
